title: An Old-Fashioned Girl
description: Polly never questioned the way she was until she went to visit her city cousins. Fanny looks too glamorous to be Polly's age and wouldn't be caught dead sledding down a hill. Only Tom, Fanny's brother, supports Polly as she tries to see where she fits in. By the author of "Little Women".
author: Louisa May Alcott
